Article api¶

GET /article/(int: article_id)¶

게시물 불러오기

Paramaters

article_id

  • name: article_id

  • in: path

  • type: integer

  • description: 게시물 ID

  • required: true

Example request:

GET /article/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gistory.me
Accept: application/json

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type: application/json

    {
        "board": "notice",
        "content": "testbody",
        "id": 1,
        "is_notify": 0,
        "is_visible": 1,
        "last_modified": "Sat, 22 Aug 2020 04:21:33 GMT",
        "reg_date": "Fri, 14 Aug 2020 00:06:35 GMT",
        "prefix": "Blah",
        "submitter": "7493683866F544D5907E93637D6B65A3",
        "title": "testarticle",
        "views": 0
    }
Response Headers

  • Content-Type – application/json

Status

  • 200: 게시물 정상 반환

  • 404: 불러오려는 게시물이 존재하지 않음

Returns

information of article

DELETE /article/(int: article_id)¶

Delete a article

Paramaters

article_id

  • name: article_id

  • in: path

  • type: integer

  • description: 게시물 ID

  • required: true

Example request:

DELETE /article/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gistory.me
Accept: application/json

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Response Headers

  • Content-Type – application/json

Status

  • 200: 게시물 삭제 성공

  • 404: 삭제하려는 게시물의 존재하지 않음

PUT /article/(int: article_id)¶

게시물 수정

Paramaters

article_id

  • name: article_id

  • in: path

  • type: integer

  • description: 게시물 ID

  • required: true

board

  • name: board

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 수정할 게시물의 새 게시판

  • required: false

title

  • name: title

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 수정할 게시물의 새 제목

  • required: false

content

  • name: prefix

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 새 게시물의 내용물

  • required: false

prefix

  • name: prefix

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 수정할 게시물의 새 말머리

  • required: false

Example request:

PUT /article/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gistory.me
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "board": "question",
    "title": "New Title",
    "content": "New Content",
    "prefix": "Blah"
}

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Response Headers

  • Content-Type – application/json

Status

  • 200: 게시물 수정 성공

  • 404: 수정하려는 게지물이 존재하지 않음

POST /article¶

새로운 게시물 작성

Paramaters

board

  • name: board

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 새 게시물의 게시판 ID

  • required: true

title

  • name: title

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 새 게시물의 제목

  • required: true

content

  • name: content

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 새 게시물의 본문

  • required: true

prefix

  • name: prefix

  • in: query

  • type: string

  • description: 새 게시물의 말머리

  • required: true

Example request:

POST /article HTTP/1.1
Host: api.gistory.me
Accept: application/json
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "board": "notice",
    "title": "Title",
    "content": "Content",
    "prefix": "Blah"
}

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Response Headers

  • Content-Type – application/json

Status

  • 200: 게시물 작성 완료

  • 404: 필요한 데이터가 오지 않음
